statements: SELECT * FROM WaterUsageReports;
SELECT report_id, date, water_usage FROM WaterUsageReports;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageReports ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT report_id, efficiency, performance FROM WaterUsageReports WHERE efficiency > 0.75;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageReports WHERE water_usage < 100 ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageReports WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT report_id, efficiency FROM WaterUsageReports WHERE efficiency < 0.5 AND performance = 'Poor'
SELECT date, water_usage FROM WaterUsageReports WHERE performance = 'Good' ORDER BY water_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageReports WHERE efficiency > 0.7 AND performance != 'Excellent' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS average_usage, MAX(efficiency) AS max_efficiency FROM WaterUsageReports WHERE performance = 'Excellent'
SELECT * FROM reports_on_water_usage;
SELECT report_id, report_date, water_usage FROM reports_on_water_usage ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, location FROM irrigation_system WHERE no_of_sensors > 5;
SELECT system_name, sensor_types FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT report_id, efficiency, system_performance FROM reports_on_water_usage WHERE efficiency > 0.8 AND system_performance < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_water_usage WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_name, location, COUNT(system_id) AS total_systems FROM irrigation_system GROUP BY system_name, location HAVING COUNT(system_id) > 1;
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage, MAX(efficiency) AS max_efficiency FROM reports_on_water_usage;
SELECT system_id, system_name, sensor_types->>'sensor_type' AS main_sensor FROM irrigation_system WHERE no_of_sensors > 5 ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_water_usage WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY efficiency DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM water_usage ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, volume FROM water_usage WHERE volume > 100;
SELECT id, date FROM efficiency WHERE status = 'good';
SELECT * FROM performance WHERE overall_score < 80 ORDER BY water_loss DESC;
SELECT id, efficiency_ratio, status FROM efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE volume > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, efficiency_ratio FROM efficiency WHERE status = 'good' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, date, water_loss, overall_score FROM performance WHERE water_loss < 10 AND overall_score > 80 ORDER BY date LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, efficiency_ratio, status FROM efficiency WHERE efficiency_ratio <= 0.8 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, volume FROM water_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystem;
SELECT id, location, sensor_id, water_usage FROM IrrigationSystem;
SELECT location, sensor_id FROM IrrigationSystem ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, date, moisture_level FROM SensorData ORDER BY date ASC, moisture_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, water_usage FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE water_usage > 50;
SELECT date, time, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE moisture_level > 80;
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyReport WHERE efficiency_score < 0.5;
SELECT sensor_id, performance_rating FROM PerformanceReport WHERE performance_rating = 'Excellent';
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption;
SELECT id, date, water_usage FROM EfficiencyMetrics WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT system_name, location FROM IrrigationSystem ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT id, maintenance_date, details FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE system_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_score < 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, water_usage FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_name, location, installation_date FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, system_id, maintenance_date, details FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE system_id = 3;
SELECT id, date, efficiency_score FROM EfficiencyMetrics ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC LIMIT 5;
